Package icyllis.modernui.text

Class CharSequenceIterator

java.lang.Object
icyllis.modernui.text.CharSequenceIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, CharacterIterator
public class CharSequenceIterator extends Object implements CharacterIterator
An implementation of CharacterIterator that iterates over a given CharSequence.
